greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) read by rows giving number of underdiagonal lattice paths from (0,0) to (n,k) using only steps R = (1,0), V = (0,1) and D = (3,1).
link: D. Merlini, D. G. Rogers, R. Sprugnoli and M. C. Verri, On some alternative characterizations of Riordan arrays, Canad J. Math., 49 (1997), 301-320.
xref: A108076 is the reverse, A119254 is the row sums and A071969 is the last (largest) number in each row.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 15 2002
